Typealiases.html#/s:16CorePathWrangler0B.name: PathComponent
Typealiases.html#/s:16CorePathWrangler0B.abstract: The type of a path component (e.g. ‘home’ and ‘user’ in ‘/home/user’).

Typealiases.html#/s:16CorePathWrangler0B.name: PathExtension
Typealiases.html#/s:16CorePathWrangler0B.abstract: The type of a path extension (e.g. ‘txt’ of ‘file.txt’).

Structs/RelativePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.name: absolute(in:)
Structs/RelativePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.abstract: Turns this relative path into an absolute path using the given absolute path.

Structs/RelativePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.name: resolve()
Structs/RelativePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.abstract: Resolves (simplifies) this relative path by resolving current (.) and parent (..) directory references.

Structs/RelativePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.name: resolved()
Structs/RelativePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.abstract: Returns a resolved (simplified) relative path by resolving current (.) and parent (..) directory references.

Structs/AbsolutePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.name: resolved(resolveSymlinks:)
Structs/AbsolutePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.abstract: Returns a new path that has been resolved (simplified), optionally including symlinks.

Structs/AbsolutePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.name: tmpDir
Structs/AbsolutePath.html#/s:16CorePathW.abstract: The absolute path to the system’s temporary directory. Note that this does not create a new subdirectory (like mktemp would).

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: pathString
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: The string reprensentation of the path this conformance represents.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: lastPathComponent
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: The last component of this path.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: lastPathExtension
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: The extension of the last component of this path.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: init(pathString:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Creates a new path by parsing the given string.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: current
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Returns the current path.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: isSubpath(of:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Checks whether the receiver is a sub-path of the given absolute path.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: isSubpath(of:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Checks whether the receiver is a sub-path of the given relative path.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: append(_:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Appends a relative path to the receiver.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: appending(_:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Returns a new path which has other appended to the receiver.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: append(pathComponents:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Appends the path components, taken from each element of the sequence of path component convertible objects, to the receiver.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: appending(pathComponents:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Returns a new path by appending the path components, taken from each element of the sequence of path component convertible objects, to the receiver.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: append(pathExtension:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Appends a path extension to the last component of the receiver.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: appending(pathExtension:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Returns a new path by appending the given path extension the last component of the receiver.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: removeLastPathComponent()
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Removes the last path component of the reciever.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: removingLastPathComponent()
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Returns a new path which has the last path component of the receiver removed.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: removeLastPathExtension()
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Removes the last extension of the last component of the receiver.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: removingLastPathExtension()
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Returns a new path that has the last extension from the last component of the receiver removed.
Conveniently forms a path by appending the path component of a path component convertible object to an existing path.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: init(url:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: Creates a new path from the given URL. Returns nil if the url is not a file url.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: description
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: See CustomStringConvertible.description

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: init(_:)
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: See LosslessStringConvertible.init(_:)

Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.name: debugDescription
Protocols/PathProtocol.html#/s:16CorePat.abstract: See CustomDebugStringConvertible.debugDescription

Protocols/PathComponentConvertible.html#.name: pathComponent
Protocols/PathComponentConvertible.html#.abstract: The path component of the conforming type.

Protocols/PathComponentConvertible.html.name: PathComponentConvertible
Protocols/PathComponentConvertible.html.abstract: A type that can convert itself into a path component.

Protocols/PathProtocol.html.name: PathProtocol
Protocols/PathProtocol.html.abstract: A generic protocol around a path. Currently, there are two conformances, AbsolutePath and RelativePath.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: init(path:isDirectory:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Creates a file url from the given path, by also specifying whether it points to a directory or not.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: init(path:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Creates a file url from the given path.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: append(pathComponents:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Appends the path components, taken from each element of the sequence of path component convertible objects, to the receiver.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: append(pathComponents:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Appends the path components, taken from each element of the variadic list of path component convertible objects, to the receiver.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: appending(pathComponents:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Returns a new path by appending the path components, taken from each element of the sequence of path component convertible objects, to the receiver.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: appending(pathComponents:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Returns a new path by appending the path components, taken from each element of the variadic list of path component convertible objects, to the receiver.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: isSubpath(of:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Checks whether the receiver is a sub-path of the given absolute path.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: isSubpath(of:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Checks whether the receiver is a sub-path of the given relative path.

Extensions/FileManager.html#/s:10Foundat.name: itemExists(at:)
Extensions/FileManager.html#/s:10Foundat.abstract: Returns whether an item at the given path exists. No distinction is made between files and folders.

Extensions/FileManager.html#/s:10Foundat.name: fileExists(at:)
Extensions/FileManager.html#/s:10Foundat.abstract: Checks whether the file exists at the given path.

Extensions/FileManager.html#/s:10Foundat.name: directoryExists(at:)
Extensions/FileManager.html#/s:10Foundat.abstract: Checks whether the directory exists at the given path.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
